data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7q-qmfSNcJcQ7kNvgG4HWgI&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCEOD0APgT_F-b5osI8-gP1LDOAyFgQMTK3CaV2mgeXlQ&oe=66729CCC)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=nkGvaXfpikYQ7kNvgEzkRUL&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAz4bmUm9MkI5u15J-oghlVYP8bdtIpJ_iok4B93l6bnQ&oe=6672D31F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=goc4aj0_N74Q7kNvgGaAoi1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDsfzivluylJKvtGjLdivNbILl62N9uzZwXV-MAoqKzOw&oe=6672B871)
